meanings.definition: A system of Japanese writing using Chinese characters.
meanings.sent1: In school, we learned about kanjis and how they are used in Japanese writing.
meanings.sent2: I struggle to remember all the kanjis I've studied so far.
meanings.sent3: The kanjis on the sign looked like little pictures, making it easier to remember.
meanings.sent4: The kanjis in the book danced across the page, telling a story of their own.
meanings.sent5: The kanjis stood out boldly on the page, demanding attention.

meanings.definition: The characters used in this writing system.
meanings.sent1: She practiced writing kanjis diligently to improve her skills.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper article was full of kanjis that I couldn't understand.
meanings.sent3: The kanjis seemed to play hide and seek on the page, making it hard to read.
meanings.sent4: His handwriting was so neat that each kanjis looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The kanjis on the old scroll were beautifully preserved, showcasing their intricate strokes.
